TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CustomLabel extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement

summary.span: Represents a custom label for an axis.

span.span: Represents a custom label for an axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會儲存在類別，其會公開為屬性類別。 objects are stored in the class, which is exposed as the property of the class. 除非使用指定的自訂標籤，會自動產生軸標籤的第一個標籤資料列屬性。Axis labels for the first label row are automatically generated unless custom labels are specified using the property. 如果您指定自訂標籤沿著第一個標籤資料列時，沒有軸標籤將會自動產生整個第一個資料列。If you specify a custom label along the first label row, no axis labels will be automatically generated for the entire first row. 只有自訂標籤可用於第二個標籤資料列。Only custom labels may be used for the second label row. 和屬性會決定標籤套用至軸範圍。The and properties determine the axis range that the label applies to. 使用自訂軸標籤可以顯示格線列及/或刻度標記屬性; 這個屬性指定自訂的格線列或刻度標記是否會繪製範圍中間之資料標籤。A grid line and/or tick mark can be displayed for a custom axis label by using the property; this property specifies whether a custom grid line or tick mark will be drawn in the middle of the label range.

summary.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

summary.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式可以用來建立和初始化的新執行個體類別。This constructor can be used to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 不過，建議您使用其中一個`Add`方法類別來新增自訂標籤。However, it is recommended that you use one of the `Add` methods in the class to add custom labels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定自訂標籤的文字色彩。The property determines the text color for a custom label.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double FromPosition { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the beginning position, in axis coordinates, of the custom label.

span.span: Gets or sets the beginning position, in axis coordinates, of the custom label.

value.span: A代表標籤套用至軸範圍開頭的值。

span.span: A value that represents the beginning of the axis range that the label is applied to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定標籤套用至軸範圍的開始位置。The property determines the start position of the axis range the label is applied to. 值之間的差異和屬性決定標籤文字將會顯示。The difference between the values of the and properties determines where the label text will be displayed. 例如，假設 x 軸有小數位數，範圍從 1 到 5 （1、 2、 3、 4、 5）。For example, suppose the X-axis has a scale that ranges from 1 to 5 (1, 2 ,3 , 4, 5). 若要顯示第二個點下的自訂標籤，您會設定1.5 的屬性和2.5 的屬性。In order to display a custom label just underneath the second point, you would set the property to 1.5 and the property to 2.5. 如果— 或，取決於有問題的軸-設為值，則這屬性將會顯示為設計工具中的值。If the —or , depending on the axis in question—is set to a value, then this property will be displayed as a value in the designer. 這個屬性不應設為相同的值屬性。This property should not be set to the same value as the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::GridTickTypes GridTicks { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::GridTickTypes get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::GridTickTypes value); };

value.span: A指定自訂刻度和格線是否會繪製在標籤中央的列舉值。

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies whether custom tick marks and grid lines will be drawn in the center of the label.

The default value is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LabelMarkStyle LabelMark { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LabelMarkStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LabelMarkStyle value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the label mark for a custom label.

span.span: Gets or sets the label mark for a custom label.

summary.span: This applies to labels in rows other than the first row.

span.span: This applies to labels in rows other than the first row.

value.span: A列舉值，如果有的話，用於決定標籤標記的類型。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the type of label mark, if any, to be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標籤標記只用於標籤的第二個資料列，且通常是用來群組標籤一起從第一個資料列。Label marks can only be used for the second row of labels, and are usually used to group labels together from the first row. 主要刻度的線條樣式之相關列模式的標記，例如 AxisX.MajorTickMark.LineDashStyle 屬性使用物件。The major tick mark's line style of the relevant object is used for the line pattern of the mark, for example, the AxisX.MajorTickMark.LineDashStyle property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color MarkColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: Gets or sets the marker color for the custom label.

span.span: Gets or sets the marker color for the custom label.

value.span: A表示標記色彩，自訂標籤的值。

span.span: A value that represents the marker color of a custom label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性決定自訂標籤的標記的色彩。The property determines the color of a custom label's marker.

Public Overrides Property Name As String

summary.span: Gets or sets the name of the custom label.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the custom label.

value.span: A值，表示自訂標籤的文字名稱。

span.span: A value that represents the text name of the custom label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字串值，表示項目的文字方塊名稱。A string value that represents the text name of the item.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int RowIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the index of the custom label row.

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the custom label row.

value.span: 值，指定 0 到 10，自訂標籤資料列的索引。

span.span: An value that specifies the index, 0 to 10, of the custom label row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定資料列標籤，其中 0 是最接近的座標軸到 10，進一步大部分的軸標籤的資料列標籤的索引。The property specifies the index of the row label where zero is the row label closest to the axis to ten, the further most axis label. 只有自訂標籤可以用於標籤以外的資料列的第一個資料列。Only custom labels can be used for the label rows beyond the first row. 如果自訂標籤用於第一個資料列，該整個座標軸的標籤將不會自動產生。在此情況下，第一個資料列的所有標籤然後都必須自訂標籤。If a custom label is used for the first row, labels for that entire axis will not be generated automatically; in this case, all labels for the first row must then be custom labels.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the custom label text.

span.span: Gets or sets the custom label text.
A value that represents the label text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性取得或設定的標籤文字物件。The property gets or sets the label text of the object. 請注意，第一個標籤資料列的座標軸標籤自動產生，但可以使用覆寫物件。Note that axis labels for the first label row are generated automatically, but can be overridden using objects. 如果您指定自訂標籤沿著第一個軸資料列時，沒有軸標籤將會自動產生整個第一個資料列。If you specify a custom label along the first axis row, no axis labels will be automatically generated for the entire first row.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ToolTip { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the custom label tooltip text.

span.span: Gets or sets the custom label tooltip text.
A that represents the tooltip text.

span.span: Gets or sets the starting position of the custom label, in axis coordinates.
A value that represents the starting position.
